name: Streets of NewCity
description:
Streets of NewCity is a turn-based card battler in cyberpunk setting.
Fight for the streets of that dangerous city and become the new king of New City.

Description:

Set the number of characters before the battle and fight for your place on these streets. Each team can have up to 3 characters.

Take a control of one Player character.

You and your allies randomly get one of 4 playable cards:

  • Attack - deal 3 damage to opponent 
  • Poison - apply poison effect on your opponent that deal 1 damage immediately and 1 damage next turn.
  • Armor - give your character 5 armor that lasts 3 turns and prevents from taking damage.
  • Heal - heal 1 damage and remove poison effect.

Features:

In standard game enemies always play "Attack" card.

Allies always try to protect and heal the most damaged character of their team.

Controls:

  • Mouse to use cards and switch turns
  • "R" button to reload game
